summary.what: Add notes field to ledger entries for deliberation capture
summary.why: Council-approved design: notes captures the journey to a decision (thinking out loud, alternatives explored), distinct from why which captures the verdict. Coaching by question not structure, following the proven pattern from why coaching.
summary.how: Added Notes string with omitempty to Entry struct, --notes CLI flag, MCP LogInput field, prime coaching text (20-line BAD/GOOD block), truncated verbose display, show section, draft template hints. Extracted workflow constant to prime_workflow.go to stay under file-length lint limit.
